## DidIonMethod.getDefaultSigningKey() method

Given the W3C DID Document of a `did:ion` DID, return the identifier of the verification method key that will be used for signing messages and credentials, by default.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getDefaultSigningKey(options: {
        didDocument: DidDocument;
    }): Promise<string | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { didDocument: [DidDocument](./dids.diddocument.md)<!-- -->; } |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string \| undefined&gt;

Verification method identifier for the default signing key.
